titles: Eben-ezer, or, A small monument of great mercy appearing in the miraculous deliverance of William Okeley, Williams Adams [brace] John Anthony, John Jephs, John ----, carpenter, from the miserable slavery of Algiers, with the wonderful means of their escape in a boat of canvas ... / by me William Okeley.
author: Okeley, William.
Deane, James.
notes: Contains frontispiece illustrating scenes of Algerian captivity.
Imperfect: stained and cropped, and with print show-through.
"A further narrative of James Deane and others" -- p. 86-100.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
keywords: Algeria --  Description and travel --  Early works to 1800.
